articles.title: Harbhajan Singh unveils his India squad for Asia Cup 2023; snubs two prominent players - Cricket Times
articles.description: Jasprit Bumrah is set to captain an understrength Indian team in the three T20Is against Ireland, taking place in Dublin. The series opener is scheduled for Friday (August 18). Nevertheless, the primary spotlight is already on the upcoming 50-over Asia Cup, s…

articles.author: Jennifer Jacobs, Jordan Fabian
articles.title: Five Things to Watch as Biden Hosts Japan, South Korea Leaders - Bloomberg
articles.description: President Joe Biden will host the leaders of South Korea and Japan on Friday at Camp David, a first for the three nations as they confront mounting threats in the Asia-Pacific.
articles.content:
